Module hanyaeger.api
Package com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.scenes.delegates

Class BackgroundDelegate

java.lang.Object
com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.scenes.delegates.BackgroundDelegate
All Implemented Interfaces:
Destroyable, com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.media.ResourceConsumer
public class BackgroundDelegate
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.media.ResourceConsumer, Destroyable
A BackgroundDelegate follows the Delegate pattern and embraces Composition over Inheritence. It can be used to deal with both background audio and background images for a YaegerScene.

  • Method Details

    • setup

      public void setup​(javafx.scene.layout.Pane pane)
      Setup the Pane belonging to this BackgroundDelegate.
      Parameters:
      pane - The Pane that should be used when setup.

    • setBackgroundAudio

      public void setBackgroundAudio​(java.lang.String backgroundAudioUrl)
      Set the background audio. The audio will loop indefinite while the Scene is active.
      Parameters:
      backgroundAudioUrl - the url of the audio file

    • setBackgroundColor

      public void setBackgroundColor​(javafx.scene.paint.Color color)
      Set the background color of the YaegerScene.
      Parameters:
      color - The Color of the background.

    • setBackgroundImage

      public void setBackgroundImage​(java.lang.String backgroundImageUrl)
      Set the background image. The image will be set as the full background for the Scene.
      Parameters:
      backgroundImageUrl - The url of the image file. This is relative to the resource/ folder.
